table_caption: Basic statistics for the 10 contributing data sets.
table_foot: MRi-Share, magnetic resonance imaging subcohort of Internet-based Students HeAlth Research Enterprise; BIL&GIN, Brain Imaging of Lateralization study at Groupe d'Imagerie Neurofonctionnelle; SYS cohort, Saguenay Youth Study; ASPSF, Austrian Stroke Prevention Study Family; OATS, Older Australian Twin Study; LBC 1936, Lothian Birth Cohort; MAS, Memory and Ageing Study; TIV, total intracranial volume estimated with Freesurfer 5.3 version except “*” with FreeSurfer 6.0 version. †data subsample size < 30 (not included in the age category statistical analysis).
